guide.introduction_rendered:
Relevant parts
  • Cell Phone
  • Fresnel Lens
  • Rubber, wood, cardboard, etc.
  • Tripod

lines.text: Obtain a Fresnel lens like one of these from eBay or other retailer.
lines.text_raw: Obtain a Fresnel lens like one of [http://www.ebay.com/sch/i.html?_trksid=p5197.m570.l1313&_nkw=fresnel+lens+full+page&_sacat=0&_from=R40|these] from eBay or other retailer.

lines.text: Make a stand for the lens. This can be as simple as cutting slots in two blocks of rubber, foam or wood.
lines.text_raw: Make a stand for the lens. This can be as simple as cutting slots in two blocks of rubber, foam or wood.

lines.text: Stand the lens vertically and prop up your cell phone behind it.
lines.text_raw: Stand the lens vertically and prop up your cell phone behind it.

lines.text: Adjust the distance between the two until the magnification is to your liking.
lines.text_raw: Adjust the distance between the two until the magnification is to your liking.

guide.summary: Enlarge your cell phone screen 100% with a simple trick using a Fresnel lens.
guide.title: Cell Phone Trick Enlarges Your Screen
